title: Replace app icon with new circular Rawly41 logo

requirements.summary: Replace all existing app icons with the newly uploaded circular Rawly41 logo featuring pink dripping text on turquoise swirl background with white border
acceptanceCriteria: All icon sizes (192x192, 512x512, 180x180 for Apple) use the new circular Rawly41 logo with white border
The manifest.json file references the updated icon files
The index.html Apple touch icon link points to the new icon
When installed as a PWA, the app displays the new circular logo on the home screen

file_operations.description: Update the icons array to reference the new generated icon files. Replace the existing icon references with frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-192.dim_192x192.png for the 192x192 icon and frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-512.dim_512x512.png for the 512x512 icon. Ensure the src paths use the correct relative paths from the manifest.json location (/assets/generated/icon-192.dim_192x192.png and /assets/generated/icon-512.dim_512x512.png).

Update the Apple touch icon link element to reference the new generated Apple icon file. Replace the existing href value with /assets/generated/apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png to point to the frontend/public/assets/generated/apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png file.
